text: phir unakee tauba kubool kee aur unakee hidaayat kee pharamaaya ki tum donon behasht se neeche utar jao tum mein se ek ka ek dushaman hai phir agar tumhaare paas meree taraph se hidaayat pahunche to (tum) usakee pairavee karana kyonki jo shakhs meree hidaayat par chalega na to gumaraah hoga aur na museebat mein phansega
